programme.title: Young Euro Classic 2017 Asian Youth Orchestra

(重)带着梦想从台湾来到新加坡发展的年轻厨师，在怡凤的安排下认识了同乡球友阔大了生活圈，并安排他与心目中的名厨偶像见面。而Pornsak则来到星级酒店代班当初级厨师，从验收、备料到烹饪都得一手包办。.

programme.title: 大厨帮帮忙 Hey Chef! 2 - EP 2

programme.title: 小空间 Small Spaces - EP 11

programme.title: 118 - EP 212

programme.title: 芈月传 The Legend Of Miyue - EP 43
programme.desc: (R) Meng Ying, who is in love with Su Qin, fails to stop him from leaving Xian Yang. Believing that Miyue is responsible for this, Meng Ying distances herself from Miyue. (PG)(重)苏秦心灰意冷，决定离开咸阳。孟赢闻悉赶来，却无法劝他留下。孟赢禀告父王，秦王爱才心切，想要派人去追苏秦回来，不料遭秦王后出面劝阻。孟赢误以为是芈月从中阻扰，心生芥蒂，就此疏离芈月。.

programme.title: 走进走出 The Family Court - EP 22

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 187
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 西瓜甜不甜 Say Cheese - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Xi Gua Shu goes missing, Ze Jia is worried sick. Xi Gua Shu is actually hiding at Liu Lian Sao's place. Liu Lian Sao conjures up a plan to knock Xi Gua Shu out with sleeping pills. Thereafter, she informs Xi Gua Shu's children about him and they rush back to see him. Liu Lian Sao secretly films the reaction of his anxious children. Elaine continues to cling on to Yuan Hang. Liu Lian Sao finally decides to tell Ze Jia about how Yuan Hang sold himself out to help clear her name. (PG)(重)(大结局)西瓜叔不知所踪，泽家等担心不已。榴梿嫂设计，让西瓜叔吃了安眠药后昏睡，自己偷偷拍下众人回来紧张父亲的情景，终令他们和解。Elaine又来纠缠远航，榴莲嫂心里矛盾，终于把远航为了泽家出卖自己的事告诉她。泽家和远航的恋情，是否能开花结果？.

Reminiscing the glory of a dynasty while visiting Agra Fort and be amazed by the spectacular view of it. As he had already passed away, she meets with his son, Ji Guang, instead. Mei Mei decides to let Ji Guang work in her kitchen but Ying Xiong objects. Mei Mei suggests a three day probation for Ji Guang, while he makes a dish which will impress Ying Xiong. (PG-部分画面令人不安)美美煮咸鱼肉饼时，回忆起中学时期曾吃过的肉饼，决定重访故人。虽然故人已经过世，却结识其子继光。美美决定让继光到小厨工作，英雄反对。美美提议英雄给继光三天的时间，让他做出令英雄满意的菜。.

programme.title: 春花望露 Spring Flower - EP 0290 & 0291
programme.desc: Ep290 - Youtu and Lihua hold a feast to celebrate Xiunv's birthday. However, all the guests are their business partners. Xiunv feels uneasy as both Youzhi and Youchun have not turned up. Ep291 - Chunsheng delivers the medicine to the banquet room for Xiunv. He later sends Xiunv home when she feels unwell. In the meantime, Youchun blames Lihua for neglecting Xiunv. Youtu feels awkward. (PG)第290集-有土和丽华设宴为秀女庆生，但宾客全都是生意伙伴。有志和有纯都没有到场为秀女贺寿，令她感到很不自在。第291集-春生为秀女送药到宴会厅，并提早送秀女回家休息，秀女感激。有纯指责丽华没有关注秀女的感受，丽华反唇相讥，有土顿感为难。.

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 15
programme.desc: Pretty Haiying had a chess game with Director Wu. When asked about her relationship with Daojing, Haiying revealed that she still liked Daojing despite being separated from him. Wu Haiying and Pu Daojing cooled down, after sharing a kiss. Wu Haijing was angry when Daojing did not try to look for her. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)漂亮吴海英与吴会长下棋时，被问到与道京的关系，她犹豫地说结束了但她还是很喜欢道京。吴海英与朴道京亲吻后，大家都各自冷静了。吴海英感到十分愤怒，不明白为何道京不找她。.

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 16
programme.desc: Taizhen tells Haiying that Daojing ruined their marriage, Haiying feels hurt to think that Daojing did it because he loved the pretty Haiying so much. (PG-些许性相关语)(双声道-中/韩)泰振告诉海英毁了她的婚姻的人是道京。她觉得道京这么做是因为他非常喜欢漂亮吴海英，感到受伤。.

programme.title: 歌手2018 Singer 2018 - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) This series features a modification to the Challenge rounds, with the Challenger entering the competition starting at the knockout rounds instead of Challenge round (where a new substitute singer would enter the competition instead). Challengers must avoid last place on their first week in addition to finishing in top four on the second week (in a combination of both knockout and challenge rounds) to be declared safe; failing either challenge instantly eliminates the singer from the competition. (重)《歌手2018》与往季竞演结束后统一投票的操作方式有所不同，本季光临现场的大众听审们有两次机会行使投票权力，而新增的这一次机会是“预投票”环节。“预投票”环节，是指500位大众听审在前四位出场歌手中选择一名进行一轮“预投票”。该节目的首发歌手为汪峰、Jessie J、李圣杰、张韶涵、GAI、张天、李晓东；补位歌手为李泉、华晨宇、腾格尔、郁可唯；踢馆歌手为苏诗丁、KZ·谭定安、霍尊，由张韶涵担任该节目的首位女性音乐串讲人。.

programme.title: 歌手2018 Singer 2018 - EP 14

programme.title: 信号 Signal - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) The death of Xiuxuan makes Haiying realise that there is a price to pay if the past is altered. He is in a dilemma about continuing his communication with Caihan. Back in the past, Caihan begins to uncover the truth of a heist in order to help Wu Jingtai clear his criminal charges. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)因秀贤的死而受到打击的海英，醒悟到贸然改变过去的话将会付出严重的代价。他苦恼以后还应不应该继续和材韩用无线电通话。过去的材韩为了帮吴敬泰洗脱罪名，开始揭开与大盗案件有关的另一个真相。.

programme.title: 小当家 Little Maestros - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) A child should enjoy his weekends, free of care. But for Luo Guangzhi, a 13-year-old boy in Guizhou, China, his weekends are spent caring for his paralysed mother, a responsibility that he has shouldered from the age of 7. Despite the obvious toil, he never fails to head back home for the weekend. (重)母亲工作受伤瘫痪在床，从此改变了罗光志的生活。原本懵懂好玩的小男生，7岁开始便要学习照顾母亲。因为课业关系，他一个星期只能在家两天。每逢星期五一放学他就直奔家里，代替出外工作的父亲照顾母亲。.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Is men the weaker gender in a relationship? Due to societal pressures, men often hide their emotions and portray a masculine image. It is often said that breakups hurt women more in the short term but men never fully recover. Let's listen to what the guests have to say about this! (重)男人在感情世界里是弱者？碍于世俗眼光，他们必须隐藏内心的想法，不能宣泄被女人甩后的痛楚! 看郑斌辉和黄嫊方展开唇枪舌剑捍卫自己的观点！此外，嘉宾们也会分享分手的技巧和分手时的遣词用字。千万不要错过！.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Zaiyong finds out that Xiantai is working as a substitute driver outside work. He purposely orders Xiantai to quit his part-time job so as to make things difficult for Xiantai. Xiuqing tries to plea with Zaiyong, causing Zaiyong to mind Xiantai's presence even more. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)载永发现贤泰兼差当代理驾驶，以安全考量为由，要贤泰辞掉代理驾驶的工作。秀卿尝试帮贤泰求情，反而令载永更加在意贤泰的存在。.

programme.title: 結婚契約 Marriage Contract - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) En-xing breaks down in tears when Huixiu tells her shes not going to marry Zhixun. Meilan's brother sends her to the hospital when she faints at home. Zhixun is grateful to his uncle when he offers to donate part of his liver to Meilan. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)慧秀告诉恩星她不跟治勋结婚了。恩星失望痛哭，治勋在门外听到两人的对话，觉得非常心酸。美兰病危，被哥哥送到首尔的医院。治勋的舅父说要捐肝给美兰，治勋感激。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 47
programme.desc: Xiaojing befriends Xiulan on purpose with the aim of using Xiulan to deal with Jinghui and Yingshu. Xiaojing tells Xiulan that not only has Jinghui bullied Shiyan, she has also tried to accuse Shiyan of being mentally unwell so that Jinghui can take over the company. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)孝静计划利用秀兰对付京慧和英淑。她故意接近秀兰跟她说京慧不但羞辱和践踏世妍，还为了霸占财产，企图把世妍变成精神病患者。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 48
programme.desc: Shiyan produces the recording of the conversation between Qitai and Zhexiu 30 years ago to prove that Qitai is not behind the factory pollution. Thereafter, Shiyan tells the victims' family members that Minghuan and Xiaojing have covered up the truth on purpose to lay their hands on the company. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)世妍播放奇泰30年前跟金基哲的对话内容，向受害者家属证奇泰当年并非为了利益而故意让工厂排放毒气的。接着，世妍指明焕跟金基哲的女儿金孝静不但有奸情，还因为想霸占公司所以故意掩盖真相。.

programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 6
programme.desc: The pair eventually finds Xiao Qi in Shaman Cape and Kai Xiang and Xiao Qi tearfully embrace. After going through so much, Kai Xiang opens up to Xiao Qi and the two share a moment. On arriving in Irkutsk, the trio checks into a hotel that Kai Xiang and Xiao Qi had visited five years ago. Kai Xiang starts to regain some of his memories with Xiao Qi and they head to a restaurant to celebrate, but Kenneth soon finds a peculiar photograph hanging on the wall. (PG)凯翔和Kenneth最终在萨满海角找到筱琦，二人相拥而泣。在经历了种种反思和回忆之后，凯翔也与筱琦打开心房，更加了解彼此的心意。但在旁边陪伴的Kenneth却心情复杂。在伊尔库茨克，三人来到五年前，凯翔与筱琦曾经下榻过的酒店。途中，凯翔不由自主地泛起种种来自过去的幻觉：Kloudiia的身影，孩子的脚步……过去的记忆碎片正如潮水般涌来，甚至连同与筱琦的记忆一起浮现。那一刻，当凯翔激动地告诉筱琦，他终于第一次记起她的时候，筱琦感到万分的感动。三人于是前往凯翔和筱琦五年前去过的餐厅庆祝。Kenneth无意间被餐厅墙上的一张照片吸引住了目光。.

programme.title: 混口饭吃而已 Hear My Thoughts - EP 6
programme.desc: Familiar real-life scenarios with hilarious caricature, Hear My Thoughts brings to attention the bottled-up sentiments of people at their workplace. 幽默短片《混口饭吃而已》，以逗趣的方式叙述各行各业的酸甜苦辣！打工仔的内心喊话及苦衷——只有自己最清楚，真相也绝非你所能想象！演员阵容包括：田铭耀、鐘琴、王智荟、胡佳嬑、坤华、罗翊绮及林茜茜，还有客串嘉宾周崇庆、权怡凤、朱厚任等。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 9
programme.desc: Ignoring Ling Xiong's advice not to act on his own, Ricky unwittingly walks into a deadly trap when he traces Chen Wan Hui to his hideout and attempts to capture him. Meantime, Kent and Kate arrive at her family's seaside bungalow to look for the missing loot. (PG13-暴力镜头)令熊警告其家人，千万不可轻举妄动。但令家就不听劝告，独自跟踪陈万辉至其藏匿处，准备单枪匹马将他手到擒来。谁知这是陈万辉布下的陷阱，令家就马上就有性命之危。另一方面，令千佑与韦以柔为了追查赃物的下落，结伴来到了韦家的海边别墅。.

programme.title: Fresh！新登场 Fresh Takes - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) "Fresh Takes" is a series of 10 local short films directed and produced by Mediacorp artistes Bryan Wong, Romeo Tan, Shane Pow, Priscelia Chan, Joanne Peh and Ian Fang, as well as production teams from Mediacorp Chinese Drama, Studiomonki, Wawa Pictures and August Pictures. (重)“他和她，心与心的距离有多远？也许在100米内。他和她，心灵深处的喜悦和自我意识的距离有多远？也许在100米外。当心灵回到0直径，也许就会发现心灵伴侣只是在100米之内。"35岁生日的这一天也是单身贵族的琦琦最迷失与沮丧的一天。她发现Dating App认识的potential是个花心萝卜，职场上的升职机又煲汤了。Food Deliveryman智贤拿错了妹妹Celine的手机，发现Celine在用Dating App认识新朋友。Dating App里100米detection功能便成为了拉引琦琦和智贤的红线。智贤机缘巧合发现了在几米内的琦琦。智贤瞬间也感受到她的孤寂与对人生的无力感。智贤潜意识的一股冲动促使他用了Celine的Dating App身份发了第一个message给琦琦…主要表达出现今社会，在网络上寻求真爱的趋势与爱情的真谛，生活勇者们努力的在平衡赤子之心和面对社会准则与四面压力的侵袭时，往往不自觉的感受到寂寞无奈。.

programme.title: Fresh！新登场 Fresh Takes - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) "Fresh Takes" is a series of 10 local short films directed and produced by Mediacorp artistes Bryan Wong, Romeo Tan, Shane Pow, Priscelia Chan, Joanne Peh and Ian Fang, as well as production teams from Mediacorp Chinese Drama, Studiomonki, Wawa Pictures and August Pictures. (重)13岁的震峰被母亲红姐从成都带到了新加坡读书，离开家乡的震峰满是不悦的呆在这里。读书因为英文基础不好，因此而留级了2年。在学校的日子受到了排挤，母亲红姐也想尽办法在新加坡找工作谋生。震峰因为一次在学校打架的事件认识了他这辈子最好的两位好友，阿辉和Arun（印度）。他们年龄比震峰大了一两岁，好像哥哥一样的教导震峰英文和数学，震峰也因此渐渐的融入了这块土地。震峰随后因为房东欠银行一大笔钱而遭到了无家可归的下场，在熟食中心流浪睡觉了一个月。母亲知道了儿子无家可归的消息，也连忙赶到了新加坡，带着儿子吃上第一次来新加坡的鱼圆面。从此震峰也下定了决心要拥有一套自己的房子。.

programme.title: 百味人生 Food Of Life - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) A person's life begins with the first cry and this new life will experience the joy and sorrow in life and the taste of life. Birthday is a day to mark a mother's suffering from giving birth. Besides sending birthday messages, most people will celebrate one's birthday with sumptuous meal every year. (重)人的一生从一声啼哭开始。一声啼哭，一个新生命来到世上，他将经历人生的悲欢离合，尝尽人生百味。生日是母难之日。人们感怀一眨眼又度过一年，每年在他的诞生日, 人们会以百味美食为他庆生, 献上祝语为他祝贺。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Xiuqing is unhappy when she mistakes Xiantai to be romantically-linked to both Yingxin and Jia-en. Xiantai explains that he does not have a lover at the moment, causing Xiuqing to be over the moon. (重)秀卿误会英心是贤泰的女友，后来又听到佳恩对贤泰的告白，于是觉得贤泰很多情。贤泰发现秀卿对他不满，向她表明身边没有喜欢的女人。秀卿听了很开心。.

programme.title: 結婚契約 Marriage Contract - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Zhixun pleads for Huixiu to stay by his side, but Huixiu rejects him with the excuse that their relationship is causing too much stress for her. programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 49
programme.desc: Jinghui is envious of Shiyan's popularity in the company and decides to work with Minghuan to get rid of Shiyan. Minghuan instigates Jinghui to kidnap Xiulan. programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 50
programme.desc: Jinghui realises that Minghuan and Xiaojing are planning to make use of her to kill Xiulan. Jinghui drugs Xiaojing and informs Shiyan to rescue Xiulan once Xiaojing has fallen into deep sleep. Xiulan escapes from Xiaojing's house. She is badly injured when she falls down a flight of stairs. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)京慧发现明焕和孝静要借她的手把秀兰给杀了，然后让世妍对她展开报复。京慧在孝静的酒里加入安眠药，待孝静睡着后便拨电给世妍要她到孝静的家接秀兰。岂料，秀兰因为害怕，自己逃出京慧的公寓，失足从楼梯跌下，陷入昏迷。.

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 10
programme.desc: Celebrities will be invited to visiit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be before hand. programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 10

programme.title: 一人行。暖人心 Going Miles, Spreading Smiles - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Eric is a social worker at HealthServe, a non-profit organization dedicated to healing and providing hope to migrant workers. For the past 6 years, Eric worked at the medical clinics, providing social assistance to Chinese workers in Singapore. (重)因工作关系接触来自中国的客工，Eric看到了一些发生事故的客工，受伤回国后，还遭受村民和家人的另眼相待，处境堪怜。于是，他自费飞往中国去关怀他们，并且捐钱及从事辅导工作。每年4月及10月，他固定到中国5个省份（山东、河南、河北、江苏、安徽）关怀他们。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Zaiyong sees red when he finds out that Xiuqing has helped Xiantai conduct his survey. He warns Xiuqing that he will make Xiantai's life more difficult should she treat him nicer. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)载永听说秀卿帮贤泰一起做民调，很不高兴，生气地拿夹克往贤泰的脸上丢。秀卿觉得载永很过份。 载永要秀卿知道，她越是想帮贤泰，他就会令贤泰过得更辛苦。.

programme.title: 結婚契約 Marriage Contract - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) A passer-by calls Zhixun when she finds Huixiu's bag and mobile phone in the hospital. Zhixun meets up with Huixiu's doctor when he sees the medicine and bills in Huixiu's bag. Zhixiu finds out about Huixiu's condition and finally understands why she asked for a big sum of money previously. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)慧秀把手提包和手机留在医院忘了拿。拾到的人拨电给治勋。治勋看到手提包里的药和帐单后与医生见面，这才发现慧秀的病情，突然明白慧秀当初为何要求那么多钱。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 51
programme.desc: Shiyan receives help from one of Xiaojing's patients and successfully leads Xiaojing to reveal her relationship with Minghuan to the family members of the pollution victims. programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 52

programme.title: 极境之旅 Forbidding No More - EP 12
programme.desc: Croatia, a country rich in culture and history, was once struggling with war and freedom two decades ago. Today, its beauty attracts millions of tourists annually. Michelle Chia, the host for this episode of "Forbidding No More" travels to Croatia to discover what's drawing tourists there. 在二十几年前饱受战火蹂躏与摧残的克罗地亚，如今凭着绝佳景色，悠久的历史和丰富的文化而全年吸引大批旅客前来观光。克罗地亚究竟有何魅力？随着《极境之旅》的主持人谢韵仪，一起体会克罗地亚的美吧！.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 11
programme.desc: Though Chen Wan Hui is eventually arrested by the police for his involvement in money laundering and other criminal activities, his bodyguard, Chai Lang, continues to pose a threat to Ling Xiong's safety. programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.desc: (R) Do you know that Genghis Khan must have grilled skewered mutton before he leaves for the battlefield? Or how is the Dowager Chrysanthemum Hot Pot related to Empress Cixi? programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Yinghao goes hiking with the new staff and accidentally drinks the wine that Ningzhi has poured into Xiantai's bottle. Yinghao faints during the descent. programme.title: 結婚契約 Marriage Contract - EP 18

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 54
programme.desc: The board of directors allows the Bella and En-Song projects to run at the same time and will vote at a later time to decide which project to launch in the market. Shiyan recruits Shali and Cheshun to help her out. Bimu and his family bring Xiulan home to take care of her. programme.title: 边缘老人 Twilight Years - EP 7
programme.desc: The story of 3 seniors who live alone, but not isolated. All in their 70s, Mr Sim is wheelchair bound; Mr Woo, a stroke survivor who cares for his wife in hospital and Mdm Tan who picks trash cans for a living. How do they get support from the care network to continue to live well in the community? 新加坡：独居老人年过七十，病痛缠身，也没家人陪伴；三位坚毅的老人，却以自己的方式独自生活。一位出外要以轮椅代步，一位靠捡铝罐维持生计，一位曾中风却坚持到社区医院照料中风老妻。这三位独居老人如何在社区养老，安享晚年？.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 12
programme.desc: At the request of her mother, Ling Xiong re-employs Ricky but arranges for him to work as a clerk under Gao Zijie in the logistics department. programme.title: Abang Lori Ohsem - EP 8
programme.desc: Zia's dream to become a pilot's wife was ruined when she found out that Luqman tricked her. Luqman too realises that Zia is a materialistic woman as she left him immediately after finding out that he is just a lorry driver. But things take a turn when Lufia begins to fall for Luqman after she breaks up with Dani.

programme.title: Rimau Bangku - EP 1
